message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make a deal at $18000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Could you consider that?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $14000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $16000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $15000?
